name: CollateralMonitor

attributes.name: SafeDecimalMath

attributes.documentation: @return True iff adding x and y will not overflow.
attributes.name: addIsSafe

attributes.documentation: @return The result of adding x and y, throwing an exception in case of overflow.
attributes.name: safeAdd

attributes.documentation: @return True iff subtracting y from x will not overflow in the negative direction.
attributes.name: subIsSafe

attributes.documentation: @return The result of subtracting y from x, throwing an exception in case of overflow.
attributes.name: safeSub

attributes.documentation: @return True iff multiplying x and y would not overflow.
attributes.name: mulIsSafe

attributes.documentation: @return The result of multiplying x and y, throwing an exception in case of overflow.
attributes.name: safeMul

attributes.documentation:
@return The result of multiplying x and y, interpreting the operands as fixed-point
decimals. Throws an exception in case of overflow.

     * @dev A unit factor is divided out after the product of x and y is evaluated,
so that product must be less than 2**256.
Incidentally, the internal division always rounds down: one could have rounded to the nearest integer,
but then one would be spending a significant fraction of a cent (of order a microether
at present gas prices) in order to save less than one part in 0.5 * 10^18 per operation, if the operands
contain small enough fractional components. It would also marginally diminish the 
domain this function is defined upon.
attributes.name: safeMul_dec

attributes.documentation: @return True iff the denominator of x/y is nonzero.
attributes.name: divIsSafe

attributes.documentation: @return The result of dividing x by y, throwing an exception if the divisor is zero.
attributes.name: safeDiv
safeDiv_dec

attributes.documentation:
@dev Convert an unsigned integer to a unsigned fixed-point decimal.
Throw an exception if the result would be out of range.
attributes.name: intToDec
Owned

attributes.documentation: @dev Owned Constructor

@notice Nominate a new owner of this contract.
@dev Only the current owner may nominate a new owner.
attributes.name: nominateNewOwner

attributes.documentation: @notice Accept the nomination to be owner.
attributes.name: acceptOwnership

attributes.documentation:
********************************\
collateral()
Reports the collateral available 
for issuance of a given issuer.
\*********************************
attributes.name: collateral

attributes.documentation:
********************************\
totalIssuingCollateral()
Reports the collateral available 
for issuance of all issuers.
\*********************************
attributes.name: _limitedTotalIssuingCollateral

attributes.documentation:
******************************\
collateralisation()
Reports the collateralisation
ratio of one account, assuming
a nomin price of one dollar.
\*******************************
attributes.name: collateralisation

attributes.documentation:
******************************\
totalIssuerCollateralisation()
Reports the collateralisation
ratio of all issuers, assuming
a nomin price of one dollar.
\*******************************
attributes.name: totalIssuerCollateralisation

attributes.documentation:
******************************\
totalNetworkCollateralisation()
Reports the collateralisation
ratio of the entire network,
assuming a nomin price of one
dollar, and that havvens can
flow from non-issuer to issuer
accounts.
\*******************************
attributes.name: totalNetworkCollateralisation

attributes.documentation:
************************************\
totalIssuanceDebt()
Reports the the (unbounded) number
of havvens that would be locked by
all issued nomins, if the collateral
backing them was unlimited.
\*************************************
attributes.name: totalIssuanceDebt

attributes.documentation:
***********************************\
totalLockedHavvens()
Reports the the number of havvens
locked by all issued nomins.
This is capped by the actual number
of havvens in circulation.
\************************************
attributes.name: totalLockedHavvens

attributes.documentation:
**************************************************\
totalLockedHavvens_byAvailableHavvens_limitedSum()
Should be equivalent to
totalLockedHavvens_limitedSum() but it uses an
alternate computation method.
\***************************************************
attributes.name: totalLockedHavvens_byAvailableHavvens_limitedSum
